name: @edouardbe/command-line-arguments-configuration-file-environment-variables-parser
description: A npm package to read from a definition object how to read the arguments in the command line, or expect them in a configuration file or as environment variables

scripts.dist: rollup main.mjs -f cjs -e 'lodash.camelcase' -o dist/main.js && rollup main.mjs -f esm -e 'lodash.camelcase' -o dist/main.mjs && rollup test/tests.mjs -f cjs -e 'test-runner,assert,lodash.camelcase' -o dist/tests.js

author: edouardbe
